name: Peanuts - A Clicker Game
description:
Peanut is an incremental game created by Saranomy and available on Android platform.

A mysterious Peanut drops to you every second.  What would you do with it?

A story of a peanut billionaire. Discover it all by yourself...

Wiki of this game is available: https://saranomy.com/wiki/peanuts
Please be aware that reading it might ruin the fun of discovery...
